text: Brad Pitt was recently rumored to hit on Margot Robbie at the pre - Oscar party in Los Angeles on March 1. A tabloid claimed that the “ Ocean ’ s Eleven ” actor was spotted hovering near the actress because he wanted to have a conversation with her. When Robbie was finally free to talk, Pitt grabbed the chance and made sure that they could be together for hours. The tabloid even claimed that Pitt is smitten over the actress. However, rumor debunking site Gossip Cop recently clarified that Pitt did not hover around Robbie until they could talk at the party. The actor did not also actively pursue the “ I, Tonya ” star.
